issue.title: [Plasma] PlasmaClient::Info() should return whether an object is in use
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2379](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2379). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It can be useful to know whether a given object is already in use by the local client.

See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1807#discussion_r178611472
